author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN AND WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS LIKELY TODAY OVER PARTS OF COASTAL SOUTHWESTERN AND WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... As of 11:00 AM MST Mon Oct 06 the center of Priscilla was located near 18.0, -107.6 with movement NNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 973 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
